title: [Large-scale] Multimodal Information Literacy Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and understanding of fundamental science curriculum concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education utilizing VR simulations in smartphone-dominant limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate diverse information formats (text, images, audio, video) and integrate them appropriately within scientific contexts.
Learners can assess the credibility of multimodal information sources by applying ethical guidelines based on the ACRL Framework.
Learners can create ethical and creative multimodal artifacts (reports, infographics, audio descriptions, etc.) on scientific topics in VR simulation environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
